name: @kamiyo/circuits
description: Circom circuits for Kamiyo - Groth16 proofs verifiable on Solana

scripts.setup: npm run compile && npm run setup:ptau && npm run setup:zkey
scripts.setup:ptau: snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 14 build/pot14_0000.ptau -v && snarkjs powersoftau contribute build/pot14_0000.ptau build/pot14_0001.ptau --name='Kamiyo contribution' -v && snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 build/pot14_0001.ptau build/pot14_final.ptau -v
scripts.setup:zkey: snarkjs groth16 setup build/oracle_vote.r1cs build/pot14_final.ptau build/oracle_vote_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute build/oracle_vote_0000.zkey build/oracle_vote_final.zkey --name='Kamiyo contribution' -v && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/oracle_vote_final.zkey build/verification_key.json
scripts.verify: snarkjs groth16 verify build/verification_key.json build/public.json build/proof.json
